contents:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Brown,
Our decree in the preceding case supersedes the decree below, directing the surviving trustees under the will of Ira Tripp, deceased, to pay $100 per month to the guardian of Rosene Eugenie Tripp for her maintenance and education, and the same is vacated and set aside, the costs of this appeal to be paid by the trustees out of the accumulated income upon the whole of testator’s estate.
